description:
Great for kids learning to ride, these gloves have lots of protective padding, and microsuede thumb patches for wiping sweat and other stuff.

  • Spandex upper hand is stretchy, light and comfy (even on hot days)
  • Low-maintenance synthetic leather palm is perforated for flexibility and breathability
  • 10mm foam padding protects little hands from inevitable bails and diggers
  • Soft microsuede thumb pad is perfect for wiping sweaty brows and runny noses
name: Louis Garneau Ride Cycling Gloves - Children to Youths
